results.title: Pomodoro (Tomato) - Hand Painted Sign

I painted it with acrylic colors and colored pencils and later applied 2 layers of gloss glaze to protect it.

Thanks for looking!

results.title: Time Management Hourglasses
results.description:
At Gravity, we design Habit-Forming products to help you fight Procrastination.

The urge to procrastinate is an emotional response, the result of a subconscious desire to escape reality.

We usually counter it with a conscious emotion: motivation, but motivation is a short term fix that needs stress or heavy pressure to function.

Procrastination should be fought not with emotions or willpower, but through Habit-Forming routines. 

Our bundle is designed to help you built those routines.  We are dedicated to help you make your life as productive as possible. 

Gravity – Key Product Features

An Anti-Procrastination and productivity enhancing product designed to help you form healthy work habits

Contains a “Work” Sand-Timer, a “Play” Sand-Timer and a manual to help you form our “Play/Work” routine.

“I like the rule that corrects the emotion.” Braque

results.title: Vintage, Vogue 2981, Skirt and Jacket Sewing Pattern,Attitudes, Carmelo Pomodoro, Uncut, Factory Folded, 12, 14, 16
results.description:
Misses Jacket and Skirt, size 12-14-16
c.1992
Oversized pattern

New, uncut, factory folded.

Loose fitting, lined, below hip jacket has notched collar, shoulder pads, princess seams, side front pockets with flaps, back slit and long, two-piece sleeves (1" longer than full-length) with slit and button trim.

Contrast under collar and sleeve and flap facings, Slightly tapered, lined skirt A, above knee, has grosgrain waistband, carriers, front pleats, side front pockets and back zipper and hemline slit.  Straight lined skirt B, above mid-knee, has contour waist with purchased piping, no side seams and back zipper.  Purchased top and belt.

results.title: Digital • Minimalist Pomodoro Planner Pages • A5 size
results.description:
Get ready to check some items off your to-do list! 

The Minimalist Pomodoro Planner Pages lets you plan your day and keep track of how long you spent on your tasks. There's plenty of room to write and most importantly a super motivating note at the top of every page.

INCLUDES
- Eight pages with a different motivational quote on each
- A guide to paper sizes and printing how-to

All files are PDFs.

FEATURES
- High-quality print-ready PDFs
- Prints on A4 paper
- Prints on Letter-size paper
- Page size is 150 x 210 mm / 5.8" x 8.3"
- Compatible with A5 size Filofax, Large size Kikki K. and Desktop size Franklin Covey planners.

I take great pride in making these pages as easy to print and cut as possible. I've also made sure to include A4 and Letter-size versions of all files so you can print easily on your regular printer paper.

I'm using these pages myself and they've changed the way I organize my work day. I hope you enjoy them as much as I am! xo Nina

Note: These pages are digital PDFs. No physical product will be shipped. You can download the files immediately after purchase in the Purchases section of your Etsy profile and start planning right away!

Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or trouble with using the digital files.

These digital files are for personal use only. :)

Enjoy!

results.title: Sugo di pomodoro al Basilico - Tomato and basil sauce -  16 oz. jar
results.description:
Tomato and basil sauce is one of Italy's favorite pasta sauce. In fact, many Italian homes make this sauce in summer from freshly picked vine ripe tomatoes.The simple combination of fresh tomatoes and basil leaves is perfect on any type of pasta. It is also wonderful on homemade pizza and as a sauce to enhance the flavor of any dish. 

All our sauces are prepared in small batches and cooked slowly  for hours allowing all the ingredients to blend perfectly. 


For more delicious, homemade specialty sauces check out my other items on Etsy!
http://www.etsy.com/shop/pipsqueekgourmet

YOU SAVE ON SHIPPING COST WHEN BUYING  MORE THAN ONE JAR.
PLEASE CHECK LISTING ON SAMPLER ORDERS. 
https://www.etsy.com/your/listings/111921248
https://www.etsy.com/your/listings/101367365
https://www.etsy.com/your/listings/91976560
https://www.etsy.com/your/listings/124117365

ITEMS ARE SHIPPED BY USPS PRIORITY MAIL ONLY. 
ORDERS OF MORE THAN 2 JARS ARE SHIPPED BY PRIORITY MAIL FLAT RATE BOXES.
_________________________________

All Pipsqueek food preparations are vegetarian/vegan sentient food (no onions and garlic) and are based on over thirty years of personal exploration. 
 Pipsqueek rejects the thought that  vegetarian food is tasteless or "less than" ...indeed,it is quite the opposite. Using only what nature has provided each delicious item presented will reveal another food reality....(Example: in sound ,think the difference between monaural and stereo/ surround sound).

In years past we often served wonderful meals to our friends without comment only to reveal at the end  that it was a vegetarian presentation. It was their  reaction to the meals (and constant requests
for jars to take home) that finally pushed us into the Pipsqueek project.  

All produce we pick from a local farm and prepared from scratch within 24 hours using only the highest quality ingredients ...no canned or frozen anything , ever. This  food is simply delicious .....When eating it is best to concentrate on the tasty food itself and eliminate any preconceived ideas regarding the word  "vegetarian"...it won't apply here . After a few Pipsqueek meals the word vegetarian will simply mean another tasty experience.

It is not our desire nor intention to create a food production monster, which is completely against the concept of ‘fatta in casa’ (home made).Items shipped to your home are taken from our pantry....you eat what we eat. Everything is picked in season,prepared within 24 hours and placed
in the pantry.  My objective  is to share Pipsqueek products with those who can still appreciate the quality and care given to the preparation of these foods. There is a uniformity in commercially prepared foods not found in home cooking.The taste you get  may vary from jar to jar but  every item you open will be a delightful and delicious experience.

Long before commercially made "factory" food our grand and great grandparents ate farm grown, hand made food stuffs. While there have been tremendous improvements in life it is difficult to argue that today's corporate food factories create  food that is more healthy and tasty than that of previous generations....'nuff said.  

Pipsqueek  foods should be eaten SLOWLY, take your time, SAVOR the flavors and enjoy the moment. 

The Italians have a proverb for any  situation ….here's one of my
favorites:
                "Nella piccola pignatta sta spesso il buon brodo"
translation 
"Oftentimes  the best soup is cooked in the small pot".

BUON APPETITO!

results.title: 54 Greek tomatoes roma v.f. pomodoro seeds
results.description:
Greek tomatoes roma v.f. seeds

All seeds in my shop are from my organic garden here in Greece.
Seeds comes to you in handmade bags.

How to grow

Tomatoes are primarily a warm weather crop. 
Note: Tomatoes do not tolerate frost at all. If you experience a sudden frost, cover your plants temporarily that night to protect them from the frost. Remove the coverings in the morning.
One month ahead of planting, dig in compost and/or well-rotted manure into your tomato garden bed. Till or dig it in about 6” deep.  The pH of your tomato bed's garden soil should be between 5.5 and 7.5 for best success in growing tomatoes. 
Drive in your supports (stakes, posts, cage, etc.) shortly after planting your seedlings.  If you wait until later when they need the support, you may damage the root structure in the process.  
There are many different ways of supporting your tomato plants. I've seen people build wooden frames (like you'd put around peonies plants) for them. Of course, there's the traditional stake method, and also the tomato cages. 



*********************************************************************

All seeds in my shop are from my organic garden here in Greece.

* I give a lot of time and effort to keep you all satisfied so PLEASE READ THE SHOP POLICIES before you purchase something from my shop. If you purchase something you automatically accept shop policies.

* UPGRADE YOUR ORDER TO REGISTER MAIL if you want safer transaction, tracking number and faster delivery.

* Germination rate depends on the country and the weather circumstances.

results.title: Natural Tomato Soap - Pomodoro Italiano Natural Soap - Handmade Vegan Tomato Soap - Italian Tomato Soap - All Natural Soap - ShimmySoapCo
results.description:
Organic Italian tomatoes are the signature of this soap! Pomodoro Italiano will transport you to a picturesque Italian villa with tomato vines overflowing with ripe, red, juicy tomatoes. As you pluck a tomato off the vine and take the first bite, you know you're in heaven. With a blend of essential oils to bring out the natural tomato scent, this soap is truly magnifico! 

Handmade soap will last approximately 4 weeks of daily shower use when dried properly in between uses. Add a handcrafted soap dish fabrication out of reclaimed wood for only $4.00 (no extra shipping charges)!

Bathe in the luxuriousness that are shimmy soaps. All of our soaps are handcrafted using high quality all natural ingredients from lush oils to fluffy butters that blend together to give you a rich lather leaving your skin feeling clean and pampered. As nature intended I only make soap using the cold process method. Nature creates it, I shimmied it together, and you enjoy it. 

You will receive (1) one bar of wonderful soap that weighs approximately 5 ounces and is tastefully wrapped and labeled. 

Vegan Friendly - Does not contain animal products, animal by-products and has not been tested on animals. We only use sustainably sourced palm oil. 

NOTE: Pictures are for reference only. As all the items are hand crafted using all natural ingredients, slight variations in the finished product may occur.

results.title: 1990 Vogue Attitudes 2563 Carmelo Pomodoro Design Misses' Lined Jacket, Tapered Skirt and Shirt Sewing Pattern Size 12-14-16
results.description:
1990 Vogue Attitudes 2563 Carmelo Pomodoro Design Misses' Lined Jacket, Tapered Skirt and Shirt Sewing Pattern

Size 12-14-16

Very loose fitting, lined, below hip jacket has notched collar, dropped shoulders, shoulder pads, welt pockets and long sleeves. Slightly tapered skirt, above mid-knee, has waistband with button tabs, side front pockets and back zipper and hemline slit. Very loose fitting shirt has contrast collar, collar band, pockets and cuffs, dropped shoulders, shoulder pads, slightly forward shoulder seams, mock front bands, shaped hemline and long two-piece sleeves with pleats and button cuffs. Narrow hem.
 
Pattern is very neatly cut, pressed, checked and complete. Envelope in good-fair condition for its age with creasing and wear especially along the edges. Top flap in tact.



For more out of print and contemporary patterns: patternscentral.etsy.com

Looking for more vintage patterns? Visit the pattern section of our sister page: oakeycreekvintage.etsy.com

results.title: Jacket, Belt, Bodysuit & Skirt by Carmelo Pomodoro -1990's -Vogue Attitudes Pattern 1113  Uncut   Size 14-16-18  Bust 36-38-40"
Vogue Knitting International SPRING SUMMER 1988 Nautical Knits
results.description:
VOGUE KNITTING INTERNATIONAL 
Spring / Summer 1988
124 pages; terrific condition

31 designer patterns include Lily Chin, Norah Gaughan, Annie Modesitt, Camille Faugeron, Susan Olsen, Perry Ellis, Adrienne Vittadini, Sheila Meyer, Cornelia Tuttle, Anne Mieke, Nancy Marchant, Tom Nectarline, Carmelo Pomodoro, Sylvia Jorrin, Margaret Bruzelius, Marlene Sigel, Martha Lambertsen, Zabeth Weiner, Issey Miyake, Wendy Keele, Katarina Ronnlund-Linden, and Donald Grover. Many of the designs are oversized and suitable for larger sizes.

Features are many, and include:
Elf-Style: Constructing the Definitive Wool Baby Jacket, by Elizabeth Zimmerman, with design instructions for a Tomten Jacket (hooded baby jacket).
 Kaffe Fassett on “No-Angst Knitting,” interview by John Birmingham.

Projects include nautical navy blues, halter-bolero set and crop top, romantic sweaters in the 50s style ala Audrey Hepburn, lots of styles with stripes, plaids, blocks and texture ... and of course much, much more.

results.title: Kitchen art print- Passata di pomodoro- Graphic illustration- (A- 570)
results.description:
Welcome to Coco & Mint, we are delighted to have you here!

We print our images with a small inner border on a wonderful high- quality and acid- free Japanese watercolor paper. Our inks are pigment- based and archival.

All items are shipped as First Class package mail via the United States Postal Service (USPS) from our studio in Helena, Montana USA.

Smaller prints ( up to 11x14 inches) are shipped flat in rigid 'Stay-Flat' envelopes. Larger prints are shipped in a tube.

It usually takes 2-5 business days to produce, package and post your print. Holidays may increase turnaround time by a day or two.

PLEASE NOTE:
- Your purchase does not include a frame or mat, or any other framing-related materials.
- The printed image may appear subtly different in color than those images displayed electronically on these pages. We make every effort to minimize such visual artifacts, but some are inevitable.


If you have further questions or require more information, please contact us or refer to our policies section: 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/LittleIvysPlayhouse/policy?ref=shopinfo_policies_leftnav
